phrases.phrase: <title>Marketplace View Time Stamp</title><info>Marketplace View Time Stamp</info>
Can post a comment on advanced marketplace listing?
Can edit own advanced marketplace listing?
Can edit advanced marketplace listings added by other users?
Can delete own advanced marketplace listing?
Can delete advanced marketplace listings added by other users?
Max file size for photos upload in kilobits (kb). (1000 kb = 1 mb) For unlimited add "0" without quotes.
<title>Total "More From" Listings to Display</title><info>Define how many listings to display within the "More From" block when viewing a listing.</info>
Enable if listings should be approved first before they are displayed publicly.
Provide a name for this listing.
Provide a location for this listing.
Successfully uploaded images for this listing.
Successfully invited users for this listing.
The listing you are looking for either does not exist or has been removed.
Invalid callback on advanced marketplace listing.
{user_name} left you a comment on your Marketplace listing. To view this comment, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} added a new comment on their own listing.
{full_name} added a new comment on your listing.
{full_name} added a new comment on {item_user_name}'s listing.
{owner_full_name} added a new listing "{title}".
{user_link} invited you to a advanced marketplace listing.
{full_name} invited you to view the advanced marketplace listing "{title}". To check out this listing, follow the link below: {link}"
{full_name} invited you to view the listing "{title}".
Unable to find the listing you want to delete.
You do not have sufficient permission to delete this listing.
You do not have sufficient permission to modify this listing.
Unable to find the listing you want to approve.
Your listing has been approved on {site_title}.
Your listing has been approved on {site_title}. To view this listing, follow the link below: {link}
Provide a category this listing will belong to.
Are you sure? This will delete all listings that belong to this category and cannot be undone.
The file size limit is {file_size}. If your upload does not work, try uploading a smaller picture.
This song has been added to your profile.
This song has been removed from your profile.
Delete this image for the listing.
Click to set as default image.
You can upload a JPG, GIF or PNG file.
Separate multiple emails with a comma.
Unable to find what you are looking for.
Be the first to add a listing.
There is one listing that is pending approval.
There are {total} listings that are pending approval.
You have not added any listings yet.
You have not received any invites.
This category name cannot be used due to that there is already another category with the same name being used.
<title>How Many Sponsored Listings To Show</title><info>This setting tells how many sponsored listings will be shown on the sponsor block. Default is 5.</info>
Can members of this user group mark a listing in the advancedmarketplace as sponsor?
To sponsor a listing please click on "Sponsor" next to the item
Can members of this user group purchase a sponsored ad space?
How much is the sponsor space worth for advancedmarketplace listings? This works in a CPM basis.
The listing you are trying to sponsor cannot be found.
Payment for the sponsor space of advanced marketplace listing: {sListingTitle}

After the user has purchased a sponsored space, should the listing be published right away? If set to false, the admin will have to approve each new purchased sponsored listing space before it is shown in the site.
Can sell items on the advancedmarketplace?
Unable to find the listing you are looking for.
This listing has already been marked as "sold".
Notice: This listing is marked as "Sold".
If you enable this option, buyers can make a payment to one of the payment gateways you have on file with us. To manage your payment gateways go here.
If this is enabled and once a successful purchase of this item is made it will automatically close this item and mark it as "Sold".
Enable this option if this item is "sold" and this listing should be closed.
By clicking on the button below, you commit to buy this item from the seller.
You haven't made any purchases yet.
You haven't sold any items yet.
You do not have any invoices.
Can sponsor a advanced marketplace listing?

How many minutes should a user wait before they can create another advancedmarketplace listing?
Note: Setting it to "0" (without quotes) is default and users will not have to wait.
You are creating a listing a little too soon.
How many activity points should the user get when adding a new listing?
Control who can see this listing.
Control who can comment on this listing.
{full_name} liked your listing "{title}" To view this listing follow the link below: {link}
{users} wants you to check out the listing "{title}"
posted a comment on {gender} listing {title}
posted a comment on {user_name}'s listing " {title} "
{full_name} commented on your listing "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on {gender} listing "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
{full_name} commented on {other_full_name}'s listing "{title}". To see the comment thread, follow the link below: {link}
Your advancedmarketplace listing "{title}" has been approved
Control how many photos a user can upload to a advancedmarketplace listing each time.
Can delete a review on listing?
Can post a review on listing?
Can delete reviews added by the others?
{user_name} has created a listing on {site_title}. To view this listing, follow the link below: {link}
You have reviewed this listing before
You can reviewed your own listing
You can not post a review
Please hold while your files are being processed.
All custom fields have been saved successfully!
Can delete reviews added by the others?
<title>Can users print a listing</title><info>Can users print listings</info>
<title>Can users follow listings</title><info>Can users follow listings</info>
How much is the sponsor space worth for advanced marketplace listings? This works in a CPM basis.
Cannot add rating to a review created without a rating
{user_name} tagged you in a comment in a listing

This tool is used to migrate listings from default Marketplace of phpFox to Advanced Marketplace.
Notice:
- Miragted listings will be moved to Other Category in Advanced Marketplace.
- Admin uses this tool only one time.

<title>Days to Expire</title><info>If you want marketplace listings to expire you can enter the number of days here.
If you enter 0 days listings will not expire.</info>

<title>Days to Notify Expiring Listing</title><info>When you allow listings to expire you can also set a notification to be sent automatically to the owner of the listing, you can define here how many days in advanced to notify them.
If you set this to 0 no email will be sent to the owner.</info>
This listing has expired and is no longer available from the main marketplace section.
If you have enabled listings to expire this setting can still display them for this specific user group. This is intended for site administrators.
Your listing "{title}" is soon to expire.
Your listing "{title}" at {site_name} will expire in {days} days.
